document.full_text: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori has a small lead over left-wing nationalist ollanta humala ahead of peru's june 5 presidential run-off, a poll by survey firm ipsos showed on sunday.
document.title: peru's fujimori leads humala in presidential poll
lines_and_colors: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori has a small lead over left-wing nationalist ollanta humala ahead of peru's june 5 presidential run-off, a poll by survey firm ipsos showed on sunday.
